name: The Stairway
description:
The Stairway is a game made by illydna in RPG Maker 2000.

You play as Stella, who has been invited to an event by her friend. However, after a while of being there, this friend is nowhere to be seen. Could she possibly have left without her? While wondering, Stella stumbles upon a strange stairway…

This game has no horror content, and is intended to be a calming experience. It's pretty straightforward, and only has one ending.

While the game is available here in both English and Spanish, there are also Russian and Portuguese translations available on the game's tumblr page.

A walkthrough is available here.

(If you've got font troubles, please check out the last part of the Install instructions here!)
